text.ascii: yudhiSThira uvAca
text.ur: yudhiṣṭhira uvāca

text.ascii: na vai nirguNam AtmAnaM manye devarSisattama
text.ur: na vai nirguṇam ātmānaṁ manye devarṣisattama

text.ascii: tathAsmi duHkhasaMtapto yathA nAnyo mahIpatiH
text.ur: tathāsmi duḥkhasaṁtapto yathā nānyo mahīpatiḥ

text.ascii: parAMz ca nirguNAn manye na ca dharmaratAn api
text.ur: parāṁś ca nirguṇān manye na ca dharmaratān api

text.ascii: te ca lomaza loke 'sminn Rdhyante kena ketunA
text.ud: ते च लोमश लोकेऽस्मिन्नृध्यन्ते केन केतुना
text.ur: te ca lomaśa loke ’sminn r̥dhyante kena ketunā

text.ascii: lomaza uvAca
text.ur: lomaśa uvāca

text.ascii: nAtra duHkhaM tvayA rAjan kAryaM pArtha kathaM cana
text.ud: नात्र दुःखं त्वया राजन्कार्यं पार्थ कथंचन
text.ur: nātra duḥkhaṁ tvayā rājan kāryaṁ pārtha kathaṁ cana

text.ascii: yad adharmeNa vardherann adharmarucayo janAH
text.ur: yad adharmeṇa vardherann adharmarucayo janāḥ

text.ascii: vardhaty adharmeNa naras tato bhadrANi pazyati
text.ur: vardhaty adharmeṇa naras tato bhadrāṇi paśyati

text.ascii: tataH sapatnAJ jayati samUlas tu vinazyati
text.ur: tataḥ sapatnāñ jayati samūlas tu vinaśyati

text.ascii: mayA hi dRSTA daiteyA dAnavAz ca mahIpate
text.ud: मया हि दृष्टा दैतेया दानवाश्च महीपते
text.ur: mayā hi dr̥ṣṭā daiteyā dānavāś ca mahīpate

text.ascii: vardhamAnA hy adharmeNa kSayaM copagatAH punaH
text.ur: vardhamānā hy adharmeṇa kṣayaṁ copagatāḥ punaḥ

text.ascii: purA devayuge caiva dRSTaM sarvaM mayA vibho
text.ud: पुरा देवयुगे चैव दृष्टं सर्वं मया विभो
text.ur: purā devayuge caiva dr̥ṣṭaṁ sarvaṁ mayā vibho

text.ascii: arocayan surA dharmaM dharmaM tatyajire 'surAH
text.ur: arocayan surā dharmaṁ dharmaṁ tatyajire ’surāḥ

text.ascii: tIrthAni devA vivizur nAvizan bhAratAsurAH
text.ur: tīrthāni devā viviśur nāviśan bhāratāsurāḥ

text.ascii: tAn adharmakRto darpaH pUrvam eva samAvizat
text.ur: tān adharmakr̥to darpaḥ pūrvam eva samāviśat

text.ascii: darpAn mAnaH samabhavan mAnAt krodho vyajAyata
text.ur: darpān mānaḥ samabhavan mānāt krodho vyajāyata

text.ascii: krodhAd ahrIs tato 'lajjA vRttaM teSAM tato 'nazat
text.ur: krodhād ahrīs tato ’lajjā vr̥ttaṁ teṣāṁ tato ’naśat

text.ascii: tAn alajjAn gatahrIkAn hInavRttAn vRthAvratAn
text.ur: tān alajjān gatahrīkān hīnavr̥ttān vr̥thāvratān

text.ascii: kSamA lakSmIz ca dharmaz ca nacirAt prajahus tataH
text.ur: kṣamā lakṣmīś ca dharmaś ca nacirāt prajahus tataḥ

text.ascii: lakSmIs tu devAn agamad alakSmIr asurAn nRpa
text.ur: lakṣmīs tu devān agamad alakṣmīr asurān nr̥pa

text.ascii: tAn alakSmIsamAviSTAn darpopahatacetasaH
text.ur: tān alakṣmīsamāviṣṭān darpopahatacetasaḥ

text.ascii: daiteyAn dAnavAMz caiva kalir apy Avizat tataH
text.ur: daiteyān dānavāṁś caiva kalir apy āviśat tataḥ

text.ascii: tAn alakSmIsamAviSTAn dAnavAn kalinA tathA
text.ur: tān alakṣmīsamāviṣṭān dānavān kalinā tathā

text.ascii: darpAbhibhUtAn kaunteya kriyAhInAn acetasaH
text.ur: darpābhibhūtān kaunteya kriyāhīnān acetasaḥ

text.ascii: mAnAbhibhUtAn acirAd vinAzaH pratyapadyata
text.ur: mānābhibhūtān acirād vināśaḥ pratyapadyata

text.ascii: niryazasyAs tato daityAH kRtsnazo vilayaM gatAH
text.ur: niryaśasyās tato daityāḥ kr̥tsnaśo vilayaṁ gatāḥ

text.ascii: devAs tu sAgarAMz caiva saritaz ca sarAMsi ca
text.ur: devās tu sāgarāṁś caiva saritaś ca sarāṁsi ca

text.ascii: abhyagacchan dharmazIlAH puNyAny AyatanAni ca
text.ur: abhyagacchan dharmaśīlāḥ puṇyāny āyatanāni ca

text.ascii: tapobhiH kratubhir dAnair AzIrvAdaiz ca pANDava
text.ur: tapobhiḥ kratubhir dānair āśīrvādaiś ca pāṇḍava

text.ascii: prajahuH sarvapApAni zreyaz ca pratipedire
text.ur: prajahuḥ sarvapāpāni śreyaś ca pratipedire

text.ascii: evaM hi dAnavantaz ca kriyAvantaz ca sarvazaH
text.ur: evaṁ hi dānavantaś ca kriyāvantaś ca sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: tIrthAny agacchan vibudhAs tenApur bhUtim uttamAm
text.ur: tīrthāny agacchan vibudhās tenāpur bhūtim uttamām

text.ascii: tathA tvam api rAjendra snAtvA tIrtheSu sAnujaH
text.ud: तथा त्वमपि राजेन्द्र स्नात्वा तीर्थेषु सानुजः
text.ur: tathā tvam api rājendra snātvā tīrtheṣu sānujaḥ

text.ascii: punar vetsyasi tAM lakSmIm eSa panthAH sanAtanaH
text.ur: punar vetsyasi tāṁ lakṣmīm eṣa panthāḥ sanātanaḥ

text.ascii: yathaiva hi nRgo rAjA zibir auzInaro yathA
text.ud: यथैव हि नृगो राजा शिबिरौशीनरो यथा
text.ur: yathaiva hi nr̥go rājā śibir auśīnaro yathā

text.ascii: bhagIratho vasumanA gayaH pUruH purUravAH
text.ur: bhagīratho vasumanā gayaḥ pūruḥ purūravāḥ

text.ascii: caramANAs tapo nityaM sparzanAd ambhasaz ca te
text.ur: caramāṇās tapo nityaṁ sparśanād ambhasaś ca te

text.ascii: tIrthAbhigamanAt pUtA darzanAc ca mahAtmanAm
text.ur: tīrthābhigamanāt pūtā darśanāc ca mahātmanām

text.ascii: alabhanta yazaH puNyaM dhanAni ca vizAM pate
text.ud: अलभन्त यशः पुण्यं धनानि च विशां पते
text.ur: alabhanta yaśaḥ puṇyaṁ dhanāni ca viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: tathA tvam api rAjendra labdhAsi vipulAM zriyam
text.ud: तथा त्वमपि राजेन्द्र लब्धासि विपुलां श्रियम्
text.ur: tathā tvam api rājendra labdhāsi vipulāṁ śriyam

text.ascii: yathA cekSvAkur acarat saputrajanabAndhavaH
text.ur: yathā cekṣvākur acarat saputrajanabāndhavaḥ

text.ascii: mucukundo 'tha mAndhAtA maruttaz ca mahIpatiH
text.ur: mucukundo ’tha māndhātā maruttaś ca mahīpatiḥ

text.ascii: kIrtiM puNyAm avindanta yathA devAs tapobalAt
text.ur: kīrtiṁ puṇyām avindanta yathā devās tapobalāt

text.ascii: devarSayaz ca kArtsnyena tathA tvam api vetsyase
text.ur: devarṣayaś ca kārtsnyena tathā tvam api vetsyase

text.ascii: dhArtarASTrAs tu darpeNa mohena ca vazIkRtAH
text.ur: dhārtarāṣṭrās tu darpeṇa mohena ca vaśīkr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: nacirAd vinaziSyanti daityA iva na saMzayaH
text.ur: nacirād vinaśiṣyanti daityā iva na saṁśayaḥ
